title: Constructivist-Based Distance Education Instructional Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental use of online educational tools and foundational concepts in instructional design
context.additional_context: Distance Education Design Competency Program Using Constructivist Approaches for Professionals in Healthcare, Legal, and Technical Fields

learning_goals: Learners can apply an online lecture design framework based on constructivist principles.
Learners can develop course mapping and assessment tools using the Backwards Design methodology.
Learners can strengthen their competency in using LMS tools to create interactive remote instruction materials.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
